name: CiscoCX-DeliveryOps-Agent
description: A lightweight orchestration and validation agent used within Cisco Customer Experience (CX) environments. Provides operational signals, lifecycle metadata, and integration checkpoints for automated workflows, environment validation, and inter-agent coordination.

health-check.description: Returns static operational health indicators for CX workflow validation.

environment-metadata.description: Provides metadata about the delivery environment for automated CX workflows.

integration-validation.description: Accepts a payload describing a system integration and returns a deterministic validation response.
